short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional controls for any video, including playback speed and playback time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1. Supporting 0.5x, 1.5x and  2.0x speed, catering to various viewing preferences.
2. Supporting playback time change, add or minus by 15 and 30 seconds.
3. Clean and intuitive user interface allows for one-click speed switching, making operation straightforward and hassle-free.
4. Lightweight extension that doesn't affect browser performance, allowing you to focus on the video content rather than tool operation.
